LayoutNode.Content: Highlights 100% cotton quilt lets you snuggle in comfort Woven quilt brings a feeling of homemade charm Fun peacock-patterned quilt brings a touch of whimsy to your bedroom
LayoutNode.SRC:
Highlights

100% cotton quilt lets you snuggle in comfort Woven quilt brings a feeling of homemade charm Fun peacock-patterned quilt brings a touch of whimsy to your bedroom

LayoutNode.Content: You'll love winding down for the night with the whimsical flair of the Indo Peacock Quilt from Opalhouse™. This printed quilt has an allover pattern of peacocks oncages with flowers blooming behind them for a unique look. Let the pattern stand out by coordinating with neutral, solid-colored blankets and throw pillows, or go for aboldly eclectic look by contrasting with bright colors and patterns. Made of 100% cotton, this fun quilt feels as good as it looks so you can cozy up in comfort. This is your house. Where you create spaces as bold as your spirit. Collect objects as inspired as your dreams. Find pieces that remind you of every place you'vebeen. Discover stories to inspire everywhere you have yet to go. This is Opalhouse.

LayoutNode.Content: looked softer both in fabric and color in picture (would not recommend) judith — 2 months ago verified purchaser I am returning. The fabric does not seem like cotton or soft. Odd texture. Colors depicted seemed softer with more muted colors. This is too harsh for the decor of my master bedroom. Soft green walls,white woodwork and dark hardwood floors. Will be a very happy choice for many I am sure. Do you find this helpful? yes (0) / no (1) / report

LayoutNode.Content: (would recommend) Momoffive — 2 months ago verified purchaser I think the colors are very pretty and flow nicely together. The material is a good, medium weight. Not very heavy.
